jd: From: Kranthi, Propelsys kranthi@propelsys.com Reply to: kranthi@propelsys.com Job Title - Technical Project Manager Pharmacy background Azure GCP AWSLocation - Louisville, KY (On-site From Day1 )Linkedin ID Mandatory Duration - ContractExperience 10+ Years Passport number Mandatory Must Haves: Azure AWS/ GCP Background, Pharmacy with Strong Healthcare Background Job Description: • We are seeking an experienced IT Project Manager/Scrum Master with a strong background in Azure services, specifically Azure Data Factory (ADF), Azure Databricks, and Python,AWS GCP to join our team.• The ideal candidate will have significant experience in the healthcare data engineering space, managing projects that involve complex data integration and analytics.• The successful candidate will be responsible for leading and managing projects, ensuring successful delivery within scope, timeline, and budget, while also facilitating agile practices and methodologies.
